name: privatenotes-fullstack
description: Full-stack Private Notes app (React + Vite + Tailwind + Node/Express + MongoDB + JWT).

scripts.install:all: npm --prefix backend install && npm --prefix frontend install
scripts.dev: concurrently -n BACKEND,FRONTEND -c green,cyan "npm --prefix backend run dev" "npm --prefix frontend run dev"
scripts.start: concurrently -n BACKEND,FRONTEND -c green,cyan "npm --prefix backend run start" "npm --prefix frontend run preview"
